publishing_focus.primary_focus: Showcase books, artist profiles, technique guides, and trend reports in the fiber arts industry.
publishing_focus.target_audience: Professional crafters, art students, craft teachers, and art lovers.
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our focus on the intersection of art and craft sets us apart, appealing to both hobbyists and professionals.
publishing_focus.example_titles: The Art of Modern Needlework, Crafting Trends: The Year Ahead, author types like popular fiber artists, industry trend analysts
